梸字的基本解释

梸
lí
古同“梨”。

梸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》力脂切，平脂，來。］
亦作“梸1”。亦作“棃1”。
(1)果木名。落叶乔木，叶子卵形。花多为白色。果实多汁，可食。
(2)梨树的果实。
(3)草名。
(4)年老。
(5)通“剺”。割裂，剖离。
(6)通“黎”。参见“梨庶”、“梨氓”。

梸字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【辰集】【木字部】　梸； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页531第13
【字彙補】與梨同。【史記·司馬相如傳】樝梸俜栗，橘柚芬芳。

梸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
梸字的起名意思

暂无。

梸
Basic explanation of words
梸
lí
The ancient same "pear".
梸
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
["Guangyun" Lizhi cut, flat fat, come. ]
Also known as "梸1". Also known as "棃1".
(1) The name of the fruit tree. Deciduous trees, ovoid leaves. The flowers are mostly white. The fruit is juicy and edible.
(2) The fruit of the pear tree.
(3) Cursive name.
(4) Old age.
(5) Through "剺". Split, split.
(6) Link "Li". See "Li Shu", "Li Meng".
梸
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Addendum] [Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梸; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 531 13
【Word Supplement】Same as pear. [Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography] Hawthorn and chestnut, orange and grapefruit are fragrant.
